Description:
4 BEDROOMS, 4 LIVING AREAS & STUDY ON 700M2
Set proudly on 700m2 (approx.) be welcomed by its impressive classic facade & fastidiously manicured garden & be graced by the homes impressive interior that flaunts a touch of class, style & captivating spaces.
Comprising of 4 bedrooms & 4 Living areas (oversized master with walk-in robe & en-suite), large study or home office, fully equipped kitchen with ample cupboard space, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher & an abundance of storage space overlooking a large family & meals area accompanied by an oversized covered extravagant alfresco area ready to entertain family & friends all year round leading to a perfectly large manicured backyard.
Journey on through the home to a separate lounge/entertainment area & an impressive rumpus/theatre room offering plenty of options for the growing family. Added to this is a downstairs powder room, roomy laundry, oversized garage with drive thru access, high ceilings, refrigerated cooling & ducted heating with the added comfort of split system in three bedrooms. Furthermore, upstairs contains its very own private retreat area, 4 great size bedrooms serviced by the striking main bathroom.
This aspirational family home provides the perfect lifestyle in one of Craigieburn's most sought-after-pockets. Centrally located and close by to all of Craigieburn's amenities including local schools, public transport, beautiful parklands and walking trails, Craigieburn Central and the new Splash Aquatic and Leisure Centre this home is well suited for all. This is an amazing opportunity to secure a home that provides for growing families. Be quick as this one won't hang around for long. Inspection will not disappoint!!
Insights: 15 Pitman Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Ideal First Home or Investment!
Perfectly located only minutes away from Craigieburn Central, Splash Aqua Park & Leisure Centre, public transport and Aitken Hill Primary School, presents the perfect opportunity to secure your first home, investment or great opportunity to downsize your current property. The property features two bedrooms with built in robes, central bathroom with bathtub, light filled open plan living and dining area which is overlook by the kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher. Quality extras include ducted heating, split system cooling, remote control garage, and garden shed. With a potential rental income of $1,434 per calendar month ($330 per week), investors will enjoy a great rental income.

Description:
IMMACULATELY PRESENTED 4 BEDROOM HOME
Ideally configured for relaxed living and entertaining, the open plan design encompasses a gourmet kitchen, meals area and living area leading out to the low maintenance garden. The practical layout is perfect for all occasions. Suitable for first home buyers or investors.
The kitchen includes stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances including 900mm free standing oven, dishwasher, plentiful cabinetry and walk in pantry.
The location is just perfect, opposite Sustainable Park and only moments away from Newbury Primary School, Newbury child and community centre and Highlands Shopping Centre adding to the appeal of this fabulous home.
Features include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, floor boards, remote controlled double lock up garage with internal access.

Description:
349 HIGHLANDER DRIVE CRAIGIEBURN
Wanting a new Address, that has all the Luxuries and necessities for today and for years ahead to come....
Look no further than 349 HIGHLANDER DRIVE CRAIGIEBURN .
Your Story begins here, in this beautifully positioned and sitting tall, on 401m2.
This grand beauty, with Five Bedrooms, with one guest bedroom downstairs with walk in robe and ensuite 3 Living Zones, Study, Gallery Kitchen with luxury 900mm Stainless steel Appliances, together with a Butlers Pantry for added Luxury.
On entry, you are greeted with the most stylish wide Door entrance , that compliments the lower ground level, Kitchen, Living and Dining leading to Alfresco with enough room to entertain your family and guest on occasions throughout the year .
Moving Upstairs, a staircase that leads you to another living and sleeping zone. Master Bedroom with spacious Walk in Robe, Double Vanity Bathroom Suite and and shower .
2 other spacious bedrooms with robes and another one with WIR and central bath and toilet .
This home will satisfy your needs and wants for years to come so to own this beautiful home, contact Amreen Singh on 0455556041 .
More Inclusions:
40mm Stone Benchtops
900mm European Appliances
Dishwasher
Downlights
Elegant Timber Staircase
Walk in Butlers Pantry
High ceilings
Central Heating
Cooling
Photos For Illustrative Purposes Only!

Description:
Heart of Craigieburn!!
Great opportunity to purchase this almost new (Metricon-Savannah) home among the display homes of the Highlander Estate of Craigieburn. Comprising of four bedrooms and study, youll find ample living space with three living zones (lounge room, family room and rumpus) and a meals area. Theatre room, family retreat (upstairs) and an alfresco gives you the space you need for entertainment. Open plan kitchen with a dishwasher, stainless steel appliances (900mm Oven/cook top), walk in pantry and stone bench tops. Master bedroom comes with full ensuite and walk in robe. Youll also find a balcony, two bathrooms, three toilets, powder room, porcelain floor tiles, stone vanity tops and high ceilings. Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, two car garage with remote controlled panelled door and internal access also included. Good size back yard.
The property is in a great location, walking distance to Craigieburn Central (Shopping centre, cinema, Splash swimming centre, Tennis court, Library, Medical centre, Schools and public transport)
Do not miss this one
Internal area
327.2867m²

Situated in the most popular pocket of craigieburn, a brand new neighbourhood living, close to public transport, shopping centres, schools, parklands, sport facilities, recreational facilities and much more.

Can you imagine yourself living there''

Description:
Great Opportunity (IN3Z) in Popular Belt
No Permit Needed for Warehouse
Service Station
Supermarket
Industrial development site in Craigieburn on the main Sydney Melbourne growth corridor, this development park is already being occupied with new industrial occupiers and new factories are being built for future demand.
Excellent opportunity to purchase this vacant industrial land. Located in a court location and easy access to Hume Highway and Craigieburn Bypass. Measuring approximately 1060m2 you can build your factory or warehouse to suit all your needs.
** 10 Mins to Craigieburn Central
** 05 Mins to Craigieburn Plaza
** 06 Mins to Bunnings Warehouse
** 02 Mins to Sydney Road
** 03 Mins to Hume Highway
** 09 Mins to Copper St Epping (Industrial Belt)
** 10 Mins to Campbellfield Industrial Belt
** Great Investment Returns

Description:
Quality Family Home on 576m2 for making memories !!
SKAD PROUDLY PRESENTS This well-loved custom-designed Henley Built family home will meet your evolving lifestyle as your family grows. Its design provides good open living areas where parents can supervise young children and also offering separate living areas to entertain family and friends.
Set on a good size block measuring approx 576m2, boasting backyard, front and low maintenance at the rear and sides.
SPECIFICATIONS:
- BEDROOMS: 4 Spacious Bedrooms (Master Bedroom with walk-in robe/shelves and full ensuite,
double vanity), other 3 bedrooms with BIR.
- CENTRAL BATHROOM: Spacious Central Bathroom with a BathTub and an Elaborative Shower.
- KITCHEN: The kitchen comprises 900 mm Stainless Steel Appliances, Electric Oven,
SplashBack, Ample Cupboard Space with walk-In Pantry and Great Fridge Space
- LIVING AREA: Formal Lounge and Open Plan Family/ Living/Dining Area.
- SEPARATE THEATRE: Can Easily fit 8 Seats
- STUDY ROOM: A separate spacious Study can be used as Pray Room.
- LAUNDRY: Spacious Laundry with Linen Cupboard and Overhead Cupboard Space.
- PARKING: Double Car Garage with Remote Control Access.
- Grand Alfresco With poll table and Water features.
- Solar panels,cctv Cameras,Alarm system and Security Doors.
- BACKYARD: Low maintenance backyard
- ADDITIONAL INCLUSIONS: Wide Welcoming Door, Concrete throughout the house, Covered
Alfresco with Gas and Waterpoints, Side Access, Downlights, Ducted Heating/ Evaporative
cooling , Customised Blinds, Powder Room, Stone Benchtops.
- LOCATION: With all the amenities close by including Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre,
Highlands Shopping Centre, Aitken Creek Primary School, Newbury Primary School, Mount
Ridley College, Craigieburn Primary School, Local Shops, Public Transport, Bus Stop, and
Child Care Facilities.
Be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!
If you're in the market for that perfect all-round property then look no further than this.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only and all photos are for illustration purposes only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent
Photo ID required for all inspections.

Description:
Throw away the keys!
INVESTORS AND FIRST HOME BUYERS ALERT !!!!
Looking for position, an investment or modern living then this property is for you!
In a fantastic location with easy access to all major amenities directly across the road to Craigieburn Central and Splash Aquatic Centre, public transport and so much. This immaculately presented and well maintained townhouse ideally suited first homes owners, anyone downsizing and investors alike.
With modern contemporary styling throughout this fantastic property features spacious living zone, three big bedrooms, 2 Master suites plus a third bathroom, kitchen meals & living area all separate.

Description:
Live in Style & Comfort !!
Now is your chance to own this house that is built with precision and high-quality inclusions. Modern and spacious, this beautifully presented home is ready for the first home buyer or astute investor. This stunning house is located in the sought after Craigieburn Highlands Estate, is designed for easy living and providing you security, privacy, and convenience.
Home Features:
• Beautifully presented 3 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms or dual living area.
• Generous master bedrooms with walk-in robe and an ensuite.
• 2700 mm High ceilings, 2340 mm Designer Doors, Bulkhead above kitchen and entry with LED lighting
• Fancy roller blinds , feature walls & Stone bench 60 mm with water fall
• Ducted refrigerated heating and cooling with 3 zones with slim line vents
• Attraction finish
floor to ceiling 800/800mm tiles & 1200/900mm Showers with niches in bathroom with rainwater shower heads and designer range Tap ware
• Under mount sink, cooktop dishwasher included and concealed rangehood
• Silk finish cabinets all over house
• Render high roof Attractive facade
• Pendant lights in living and above dining table
• Walk in pantry with water point to fridge
• Fully fenced generous backyard & front yard with landscaped garden
• Car garage with secure internal access and cooling point in garage
• Security Cameras & alarm system to fully secure the premise
• Internal Intercom, letterbox & NBN CONNECTED TURN KEY HOUSE
• Coloured concrete driveway, pathway, poxy floor paint in garage

With Melbourne's northern corridor rapidly growing it's no wonder why it's become such a sought-after location for families. Measuring approximately 349m2 with a 12.5m frontage and ready to build.
Craigieburn provides the perfect opportunity to raise a family and build your dream home. Description:
Priced to Sell !!!
This home is guaranteed to impress with great location and flexible floor plans & long list of added features. Its smartly configured floor plan is designed for easy living, as this low maintenance residence boasts comfort & style that will delight all home buyers & investors alike!
Presenting an inviting neighbourhood in Creekwood Estate this freestanding home presents a ready-to-enjoy environment of easy-living style, long list of features & abundance of natural light throughout. Comprising of 3 good size bedrooms, master bedroom with walk-in robe & full en-suite, good size lounge, main bathroom & open-plan living/dining kitchen area spilling out to a wonderful rear garden view.
Other highlights include a well-appointed kitchen with quality appliances, dishwasher, pantry, built-in-robes with sliding doors, decent laundry room with robe and solar panels for year around for energy saving , Wide side access and with scope to extend it for storing boats & caravans, & so much more! Whatever your requirements may be this property offers endless opportunities.
This aspirational family home provides the perfect lifestyle in Creekwood Estate, one of Craigieburn's most sought-after pockets. Residing amongst schools and parklands and with all the amenities close by including public transport and easy access to Craigieburn Central and the new Splash Park and Leisure Centre, this property is a must for those who need to have it all. Walking distance to local parks and bus stops. Also, with close proximity to all the facilities Craigieburn has to offer including; childcare, kinder, primary and secondary schools as well as easy access to Hume Freeway. This is an amazing opportunity to secure a home that provides for growing families and the side access makes it perfect one which is a rare find these days.
Be quick as this one won't hang around for long. Inspection will not disappoint!!!
Call Gordon Garg Today on 0433 897 397 ...

Description:
Warm & Welcoming!
Occupying a remarkably large block (532m2), this modern home delivers an outstanding family lifestyle opportunity with its free-flowing designs. Beyond the attractive facade, situated in a quiet neighbourhood is this lovely family home offering everything a family could ask for. Discover an inviting interior comprising 3 bedrooms (large master with an ensuite), main family bathroom. Add to these 2 generous sized formal lounges, equipped kitchen adjoining meals area and a vast open-plan family/dining area.
Other features include a well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances (including 600cm oven & a cook top of 900cm), as well as ducted heating & ducted cooling throughout, split system cooling, alarm system, intercom, separate laundry, plus a double garage with internal entry, huge outdoor undercover decking alfresco with entertaining area and wonderfully wide backyard. A short stroll to Primary & Secondary Schools, Childcare & Kinder services, buses (& Craigieburn train station,) local Shopping Centres, Cafes, Parks, Sports Facilities & a Golf Course.
Be sure to inspect now!

Description:
POSITION, POSITION, POSITION
Only in minutes away from Craigieburn Plaza and walking distance to Train station makes this home an excellent buy. Features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, large meals and living area, lock up garage. Extras include gas ducted heating, split system cooling, all situated in a quiet court. Currently tenanted at $1603pcm, be quick for this!
Please call 9305 7958 to book a private viewing at a time that is most convenient for you.

Description:
Size, Scope And An Ideal Setting
A modern classic on an allotment of impressive 693m2 approx. proportions, this propertys sense of size and scope is complemented by a quiet cul-de-sac position close to the transport options of Craigieburn train station and Hothlyn Drive bus services, Craigieburn Plaza and schools including Craigieburn South Primary School and Craigieburn Secondary College. Bike tracks, walking paths and parks further enhance an address offering exceptional potential for renovation, new home design or development, STCA.
Entirely serviceable current day spaces offer separate living and dining areas served by an original open-plan kitchen while three bedrooms and two bathrooms include a main bedroom with its own ensuite. Access from the dining domain to a substantial patio adds an indoor-outdoor element to todays dimensions surrounded by a significant irregular allotment featuring a lock up four car garage. Seize the opportunity to make the most of a location destined to be always in demand for its exceptional lifestyle appeal.

Description:
Instantly Appealing in a Prized Location!
A quiet and tightly held pocket provides family appeal and enticing exclusivity for this memorable modern home on approx. 635sqm land with dual living zones; one configured as a refined lounge, the other defined by a relaxed everyday mood. Surrounded by a central dining space along with a dream size fully equipped kitchen with stone bench tops, huge walk in pantry, dishwasher & 900mm quality s/s appliances.
Four excellent size bedrooms and two bathrooms, including a main bedroom served by walk-in robes and an ensuite, contribute ideal accommodation to a home.
All this located within very close proximity to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, the Craigieburn Junction Home Maker Centre, Aitken Hill Primary School and the serene, green expanses of Craigieburn Golf Course highlights the appeal of the address - and enhances the opportunity for enjoying a fantastic family lifestyle.
Comprising of:
- Grand entrance hallway
- Separate theatre/rumpus room
- Sunroom/entertaining area
- Study
- Double garage with internal access
- Drive through access to the back perfect for caravans and boats
- All of this set on a large corner allotment
- Zoned refrigerated cooling & ducted heating plus much more.
***PHOTO IDENTIFICATION IS REQUIRED FOR ALL INSPECTIONS***
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information, but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.
